rev.diff:
Line 369: Line 369:
In his television statement, Mubarak said that he would penalize those responsible for the violence and has a clear vision on how to end the crisis, but is satisfied with what he has offered. He also stated he would be attempting to revise six articles to the constitution, and, while remaining President to the end of his term in September, would transfer his powers to vice-president Suleman.
In his television statement, Mubarak said that he would penalize those responsible for the violence and has a clear vision on how to end the crisis, but is satisfied with what he has offered. He also stated he would be attempting to revise six articles to the constitution, and, while remaining President to the end of his term in September, would transfer his powers to vice-president Suleman.
